insert into share (muserId, suserId, isAddReward, createTime) values (#{muserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isaddreward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, muserId, suserId, isAddReward, createTime from share
select id, muserId, suserId, isAddReward, createTime from share where muserId = #{muserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and isAddReward = '1'
